segments.text: Observing this kitchen, I see the details unfolding slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is meticulously drying that plate, towel wrapped around it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets reveal the cookie jar, full and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is extended upward, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, perhaps to steady or collect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, creating a sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot touches the water, but her focus remains.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, bushes line a neat path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so typically domestic, yet quietly tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get a bit mad thinking about the potential slip-ups here.
segments.speaker: PAR
